name: Green Bean and Potato Salad

ingredients.name: large potatoes
ingredients.additionalInstruction: boiled, cooled, and cut into bite-sized pieces

ingredients.name: large tomato
ingredients.additionalInstruction: cut into wedges, or 1 cup halved cherry tomatoes

ingredients.name: Montreal Steak Rub or Red Garlic Topper

preparation: Combine first 6 ingredients in a large bowl. Allow to marinate for at least 1 hour for all flavours to combine.
Immediately before serving, splash balsamic vinegar overtop and gently toss.
tips: Save time by steaming green beans and potatoes easily in Epicure Silicone Steamer!
To serve hot, do not cool the beans and potatoes. Simply prepare as directed and serve immediately.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein.
